prod_short_desc: Protect NINJAGO® City from flying Manta Ray Bomber attack!
prod_long_desc:
Help Cole save Shen-Li in this cool THE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ set, featuring the Manta Ray Bomber with 2 spring-loaded shooters, 2 bomb elements and a detachable boat. Includes 4 minifigures with assorted weapons and accessories to ramp up the role-play action possibilities.
Includes 4 minifigures: Cole, Shen-Li, Great White and Shark Army Gunner.
Manta Ray Bomber features 2 spring-loaded shooters, 2 bomb elements and a detachable boat with 2 minifigure seats.
Weapons include Cole’s hammer, Shen-Li’s carrying pole with 2 buckets, Great White's fish drill and Shark Army Gunner's fish sai.
Recreate and role-play exciting THE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ scenes.
Manta Ray Bomber measures over 4” high, 9” long and 12” wide.
Detachable boatmeasures over 1” high, 3” long and 3” wide.
